funmwlangs-desc: Give admins ability to manage "Fun MediaWiki Languages" via a special page
funmwlangs-header: You may enable, disable, and rename custom languages here. To add a new language, use the blank textboxes on top
funmwlangs-invalid: The language code may only contain lowercase letters and a hyphen, must be at least two letters long, and cannot start or end with a hyphen. The language name cannot be blank
funmwlangs-nowrite: Error writing to configuration file, no changes have been made
funmwlangs-desc2: Fun MediaWiki Languages for your installation. Adds various language options to the wiki that can be managed by a special page.
